title: cmd/asm: arm assembler "illegal combination" for CMPF in Go 1.5
body:
It's likely something I'm doing wrong that just happened to work previously, but some ARM assembly that 
worked fine in Go 1.4.2 (`go version go1.4.2 darwin/amd64`) is giving an error in Go 1.5 (`go version go1.5 darwin/amd64`)

The instruction `CMPF F4, F1` at https://github.com/samuel/go-dsp/blob/master/dsp/math32_arm.s#L246 produced the follow in Go 1.4.2 running `GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm GOARM=7 go build`

```
vcmpe.f32  s2, s8
vmrs       APSR_nzcv, fpscr
```

In Go 1.5 I get during compile

```
asm: illegal combination 00128 (/Users/samuel/Dropbox/Workspace/go/src/github.com/samuel/go-dsp/dsp/math32_arm.s:246)	CMPF	F4, F1; PSR NONE PSR, 11 11
```
